submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumOperations(self, nums: List[int], target: List[int]) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        diff = [target[i] - nums[i] for i in range(n)]

        #print(diff)
        
        final_array = []
        total = 0
        positive = False
        negative = False
        for i in diff:
            if not (positive or negative):
                
                positive = i > 0
                negative = i < 0
                if(negative):
                    final_array.append(-i)
                else:
                    final_array.append(i)
                continue
            
            if negative:
                if i <= 0:
                    final_array.append(-i)
                    continue
                
                ni = len(final_array)
                ans = final_array[0]

                
                for j in range(1, ni):            
                    if final_array[j] > final_array[j - 1]:
                        ans += final_array[j] - final_array[j - 1]
                total += ans
                
                final_array = [i]
                positive= True
                negative = False
                
                continue
            
            if positive:
                if i >= 0:
                    final_array.append(i)
                    continue
                
                ni = len(final_array)
                ans = final_array[0]

                
                for j in range(1, ni):            
                    if final_array[j] > final_array[j - 1]:
                        ans += final_array[j] - final_array[j - 1]
                total += ans
                
                final_array = [-i]
                negative = True
                positive = False
        
        if(final_array):
            ni = len(final_array)
            ans = final_array[0]

                
            for j in range(1, ni):            
                if final_array[j] > final_array[j - 1]:
                    ans += final_array[j] - final_array[j - 1]
            total += ans
        
        return total
